question: Approximately, what fraction of contribution is made by Livestock sector in India's total Gross Value Added(GVA)?
explanation:
As per the estimates of National Accounts Statistics (NAS) 2020, the contribution of livestock in total agriculture and allied sector GVA
(at constant prices) has increased from 24.32 per cent (2014-15) to 28.63 per cent (2018-19). Livestock sector contributed 4.2 per cent of total GVA in 2018-19.
